# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

project(hims-packet-monitor)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-std=c++14)
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-Wall)

# Linker options
set(LINK_OPTIONS -pthread)


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/main.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/dod-parser.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/net-parser.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS
    " -std=c++14 -g -O0 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(hims-packet-monitor ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(hims-packet-monitor ${LINK_OPTIONS})

target_link_libraries(hims-packet-monitor
    pcap
)



#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
